WRITING.TITLE: [MMD] Tifa Yeah Oh Ahhh Oh! Final Fantasy VII
[MMD] Tifa Final Fantasy VII Love joy
[MMD] Tifa Final Fantasy VII Masked bitch
I want to watch/read succinct critical reviews
WRITING.TEXT: I want to watch or read anime reviews in which the reviewer is able to pick out what made the show problematic. *Not* a tirade or rant about how terrible it was. Any anime is fine, preferably well-known ones.
Four women are in the middle of town in bikinis, and all the men comment on how cool and strong they are.

WRITING.TITLE: Good soundtrack that doesn't overwhelm the rest of anime?
WRITING.TEXT:
Any soundtrack that both:
* Fit the anime so well that without the soundtrack the anime would be terrible * Isn't so obtrusive that it overwhelms the reset of the anime?

WRITING.TITLE: An anime with conflict but no evil villain?
WRITING.TEXT: Are there any good examples of an anime that has conflict but no evil villain? I don't like how some characters are evil for the sake of being evil.

WRITING.TITLE: A manga with conflict but no evil villain?
WRITING.TEXT: Are there any good examples of a manga that has conflict but no evil villain? I don't like how some characters are evil for the sake of being evil.

WRITING.TITLE: Is there such a thing as UP?
WRITING.TEXT: If there can be OP characters, can there also be UP characters?

WRITING.TITLE: What is the worst cliched aspect of your favorite anime?
WRITING.TEXT: You love your favorite anime, but is there any part that was cliched? What would the anime be like if it somehow was able to remove that part?

WRITING.TITLE: What type of staple episodes are there in anime?
WRITING.TEXT: A lot of anime have beach episodes (or pool episodes), hot springs episodes (or public bath episodes), and christmas episodes (or valentine's day episodes). What other staple episodes are there?

WRITING.TITLE: What novel showed character motivation and emotion best?
WRITING.TEXT: What novel had character motivation and emotion shown well and driving the story?

WRITING.TITLE: Which protagonists from two different anime are opposites of each other?
WRITING.TEXT: Take two protagonists, each from a different anime, who are the opposites of each other in terms of personality and motivations.
